scripts.build:dashboard: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const html=fs.readFileSync('docs/index.html','utf8');const inject=(tag,file)=>{try{const d=fs.readFileSync(file,'utf8');return html.replace(new RegExp('/\\*__'+tag+'__\\*/.+?/\\*__END_'+tag+'__\\*/','s'),'/*__'+tag+'__*/ '+d+' /*__END_'+tag+'__*/');}catch{return html;}};let out=inject('CURRENT_STATE','CURRENT_STATE.json');out=inject('INVENTORY','MASTER_INVENTORY.json');out=inject('DAEMON','.claude-flow/daemon-state.json');out=inject('CONSOLIDATION','.claude-flow/metrics/consolidation.json');fs.writeFileSync('docs/index.html',out);console.log('Dashboard built.');"
scripts.precommit: npm run index:rebuild && npm run validate
